paper_abstract: In this paper, we formulate and study a new class of discrete neural networks with time dependent delay and impulses. Sufficient conditions for the asymptotic stability of a unique equilibrium of the networks with Lipschitizian activation functions are established. Also when the impulsive jumps are absent the results reduce to those of non-impulsive networks. (c) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Asymptotic behavior of discrete solutions to delayed neural networks with impulses
